com.labyrinthconquest.game.pathfinding

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinthconquest.game.pathfinding.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.Graph<INode>, com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.indexed.IndexedGraph<INode>

    public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.indexed.IndexedGraph<INode>
    Manages the pathfinding graph for player characters

                                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 to)
        Attempt to find a path from node to node, if one exists
        Parameters:
        from - From node
        to - To node
        Returns:

      • getPath

        private java.util.List<INode> getPath(INode fromN,
                                      INode toN,
                                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 fromV,
                                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 toV)
        Get path from node to node. Needs original player position and touch position for the smoothing algorithm
        Parameters:
        fromN - From node
        toN - To node
        fromV - From vector (position of player)
        toV - To vector (position of where we clicked to find a path)
        Returns:
        Path if one exists, else an empty list

      • smoothPath

        private void smoothPath(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 fromV,
                        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 toV,
                        com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.GraphPath<INode> newPath)
        Path smoothing algorithm. Attempts to e.g reduce amount of turns in the path to a minimum so it is slightly more natural Uses raycast to check if a node can be excluded from the final path
        Parameters:
        fromV - From node
        toV - To node
        newPath - The path to smooth
